title: structure
description: Saves or loads a structure in the world. See examples of this command in use in the [Structure Blocks documentation](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/structureblockstutorial#creating-structures-using-the-structure-command).

fields.title: name
fields.description: A `string` that specifies the name of the structure. May include a namespace.

fields.title: from
fields.description: A `vector` used with `to` that specifies the opposing corners of a structure.

fields.title: to
fields.description: A `vector` used with `from` that specifies the opposing corners of a structure.

fields.title: includeEntities
fields.description: A `Boolean` that specifies whether to save or load entities inside the structure. Default: `true`.

fields.title: includeBlocks
fields.description: A `Boolean` that specifies whether to save or load blocks inside the structure. Default: `true`.

fields.title: rotation
fields.description: An `enum` of the rotation when loading in a structure. Must be one of `0_degrees`, `90_degrees`, `180_degrees`, or `270_degrees`. Default: `none`.

fields.title: mirror
fields.description: An `enum` that specifies the axis to mirror when loading a structure. Either `0_degrees`, `90_degrees`, `180_degrees`, or `270_degrees`. Default: `none`.

fields.title: integrity
fields.description: A `float` that specifies the percentage likelihood a block will load. 100 loads all blocks, 0 loads none. Default: 100.

fields.title: seed
fields.description: A `string` that specifies the seed when loading in a block with variable integrity.

fields.title: animationMode
fields.description: An `enum` of `block_by_block` to load blocks in one at a time or `layer_by_layer` to load them in in layers. Default: `none`.

fields.title: animationSeconds
fields.description: A `float` of the duration of the time to animate the structure loading in. Default: `0.0`.

overloads.title: Save structure, optional save mode
overloads.description: `Save` a `structure` with required structure `name`, `from`, and `to`, and an optional `save mode`.

overloads.title: Save structure, optional entities, blocks, save mode
overloads.description: `Save` a `structure` with required structure `name`, `from`, and `to`, and optional `entities`, `blocks`, and `save mode`.

overloads.title: Load structure, optional animation mode, animation seconds
overloads.description: `Load` a `structure` with required structure `name` and `to`, and optional `rotation`, `mirror`, `animation mode`, `animation seconds`, `entities`, `blocks`, `integrity`, and `seed`.
